Address: 5 Point Addis Road Bells Beach VIC 3228
Description:
Point Addis Paradise - Modern resort living on acres
This secluded coastal paradise in the tightly held Point Addis area directly abuts the Ironbark Basin, a haven for wildlife and birds and part of the Otway National Park. The residence is modern in its design and comprises three bedrooms, two living areas, two bathrooms, and a stunning and completely private outlook over the pool. There is also a separate 1 / 2 bedroom self-contained apartment which would make for the perfect bed and breakfast, families with older kids or extended family, freestanding gym/studio (or extra bed), established low maintenance gardens, carport, pool, extensive joinery for indoor storage, wood fired pizza oven, two sheds for external storage, separate large decks perfect for entertaining either beside pizza oven on in front of the pool, outdoor shower, idyllic beach retreat, your Pt Addis paradise will never get built out. Original O'Dowd design expanded with major Mark Gleeson extensions to create a flexible family home.
Insights: 5 Point Addis Road, Bells Beach VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Private, Peaceful, Perfect.
When I think of blue-chip Belmont, the most in demand suburb in Geelong, I'm instantly drawn to the picturesque Barwon River, strolling down to the café's of High Street or Highton Village and all whilst remaining handy to Geelong's CBD. Make no mistake, 90 Shackleton Street is a rare opportunity to have all of these delights at an arms-reach within one of Belmont's most tightly held addresses!
Built to last and offering complete convenience, this beautiful 3 bedroom townhouse occupies its own title and is nestled privately on a battle axe allotment of 470sqm (approx.). Whether you're looking for the perfect "lock up and leave" downsizer or first home or to astutely park your money where it will appreciate, here's your chance.
Comprising of 3 sizable bedroom's all with fantastic built in storage and serviced by a central 2-way bathroom with separate toilet, the heart of the home is the open plan kitchen & living area that flows out to the gorgeous north facing courtyard offering all of that warm and sought after winter sun.
Further features include:
- Remote double garage w/thru access and additional car space.
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
- Stainless steel kitchen cooking appliances.
Insights: 90 Shackleton Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2001 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Quintessential Jan Juc Living
Blue Chip Off-Market Opportunity
Positioned in the very sought after Golf Links Estate is this solid brick 1980s Dennehy Built home that delivers spacious living within a coastal environment. The property offers a short walk to all public transport, the magnificent RACV Golf Club Resort, Jan Juc Surf beach and the popular Bell street precinct with its cafes and quality restaurants.
This property is set secluded by natural trees and gardens offering spacious beach house living flowing to a bricked pergola area perfect for entertaining amongst nature. With open plan kitchen/dining/living, separate 2nd living with Ocean Views and electric oven and stove top the set up can cater for both families and shared living. Offering 3 bedrooms including master with ensuite and featuring a reverse cycle system. The large windows throughout the property provide a seamlessness between dining and outdoor entertaining and being close to local beaches wraps up this exciting off-market opportunity
Other features include: Bungalow at rear for additional accommodation or storage, loads of cupboard space, double undercover carport.
With world renowned beaches at your doorstep, Geelong only a short 15-minute drive and the Melbourne CBD a little over an hour away you quickly realise that this property is located in the most popular and sought-after destination along the Surf Coast. Dont delay your opportunity to inspect this truly magnificent property to experience first-hand coastal living at its finest.
**Currently leased for months at $505.00 per week, with a guaranteed income to buy now and design / build / renovate or simply move in later
**Private Inspections only Call for an appointment TODAY.
Insights: 28 Sunningdale Avenue, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

This Is The One
This is the one - a fully titled 595m2 corner site offering versatility to build for light and orientation. With a 17m frontage x 35m depth, you will have plenty of room to create your dream home close to everything Torquay has to offer. The Sands championship golf course, Whites Beach, new primary and high schools, sporting precincts and the Dunes Shopping Centre are all within close proximity.
Blocks of this size are now rare in Zeally Sands, so give me a call to take advantage of this opportunity.
595m2 block
17m frontage x 35m deep

Description:
1006sqm2 (Approx.)of pure potential in the Heart of Belmont!
This 1950's original Brick home set on 1006SQM2 (approx.) is superbly located in the heart of Belmont and presents the ideal opportunity for a growing family wanting a little extra space coupled with the most convenient lifestyle in the most sought after pocket of Belmont.
The spacious floor plan offers great flexibility through the home. Upon entry you will be greeted by high ceilings through the hallway with the spacious formal lounge boasting a cosy gas log fire. Step through to embrace the true heart of the home being the central kitchen which offers plenty of bench space, a breakfast bar, quality appliances and an abundance of storage. This flows out through French doors to a decked outdoor entertaining area. The central bathroom has been recently renovated featuring large semi-frameless shower, extra deep bath and toilet.
The second outdoor entertaining area is located off the kitchen. This steps down to the large backyard equipped with large Shed - 7.5 x 9M with electric roller doors and access out to the laneway, side access with space to store a caravan or boat and a spacious garden shed.
Features include:
Five bedrooms, Master with BIRs and Ensuite
Study
Large 6m x 9m shed Ideal for a boat, caravan, trailer or multiple cars. Side access with room to store a boat or caravan
Updated Bathroom Updated Kitchen
Polished timber hardwood floors
Gas log fire Offstreet parking for 5 15 x Solar Panels - 2.7KWs
Solar hot water system with gas boost
Ceiling Fans throughout
Located in the heart of Belmont within walking distance to High street shops, schools, shops and public transport. What are you waiting for? Inspect today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 41 Regent Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Desirable First Home / Smart Investment
Set upon a generous 611m2 (approx.) in a high growth locale, this charming brick home allows you to move straight in with absolute ease. Perfectly suited to those first homebuyers eager to enter the market or someone wanting to expand their investment portfolio.
You will find yourself conveniently located within close proximity to the High Street, the Surf Coast, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Epworth Hospital and Deakin University.
Upon entry, you will instantly be impressed with the polished timber floorboards and fresh white paint. The spacious formal lounge boasts a picture window thats welcomes in so much natural light. Step through from here to the functional kitchen with plenty of bench space; this overlooks the spacious family meals area.
Completing the home are three expansive bedrooms, all of which are serviced by the neat and tidy central bathroom and big laundry.
Outside you will embrace a massive backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets. This also provides plenty of scope to extend the home if you so desire (STCA).
Features:
SLUG
Heating and Cooling

Description:
Your Next Chapter Starts Here
The picture-perfect presentation of this alluring family home will immediately strike a chord among those searching for a quality home in a quintessential family setting. Add to the mix contemporary design in an iconic family-friendly location that's within minutes of all amenities including the Station, schools, Surf Coast and only one traffic light via the ring road to Melbourne, you'll be hard-pressed to find a better setting to raise the kids! Tasteful styling creates an inviting environment offering 3 spacious bedrooms + study nook, master at the front with walk in robe and ensuite that flows out to the light filled living overlooking the dining area. As you progress through the home, you are greeted with a equipped kitchen and an emphasis on indoor/outdoor entertaining defining this immaculate home with its alfresco area perfect for all seasons enjoyment. Towards the back of the home, there at a further 2 bedrooms providing easy access into the renovated bathroom and laundry with good storage. Ample off-street parking includes a remote double lock up garage with rear access into the backyard ideal for a boat or caravan. All residing on a large sun soaked 618m2 approx allotment accompanied by low maintenance gardens. With Grovedale tipped to be the next growth suburb, this is a home you'll want to call your own!
Insights: 16 Villea Avenue, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Leafy Designer Living
This is contemporary coastal living at its best. Spacious, light filled and nestled into a leafy enclave, this architecturally designed home welcomes you in to enjoy a serene retreat.
Offered over two levels, downstairs makes the most of the enviable indoor outdoor flow. Large sliding doors open onto a sunny courtyard or a shaded sheltered patio from the open plan living area. Flooded with natural light, this space works impressively well when enjoying quiet downtime or when entertaining family and friends. The extensive kitchen includes Bosch appliances; large pantry and a central island breakfast bar. The master suite, also on this level, enjoys garden access, a large walk-in robe and en-suite with shower and bath. Upstairs, a second living zone overlooks the treetops and offers the perfect spot for guests to relax in their own space. Two generous bedrooms include plentiful storage and share a bathroom.
Additional highlights of this home include plentiful storage throughout, a double lock up garage and extra off street parking too. Solid timber flooring and subtle earthy textures and tones ground this home into its naturally native and easy care surrounds. The low maintenance and secure aspect of this property make it an ideal lock and leave holiday escape or permanent residence.
With private walkway access through to Hitchcock Ave, the boutique shopping and eateries of Barwon Heads are almost on the doorstep. River, beach and extensive parklands are just moments away too. A superb location combines here with superior liveability to deliver a unique and inspiring home.
Insights: 5/22-24 Grove Road, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2015 and 32 other 3 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Dress circle position, walk everywhere.
Situated on approximately 596sqm in one of Belmont's most sought-after pockets, this property is sure to appeal to many. All your daily amenities are located within just minutes from the doorstep. Offering low maintenance and fuss-free living, this property has been stylishly updated throughout, with further improvements and a chance for your mark to be made on the property. Consisting of three generous sized bedrooms, large master with built in robes, two separate living areas, central bathroom and separate toilet servicing the entire property.
Featuring high ceilings, polished hardwood flooring, two split systems and a workshop space in garage, plus the added luxury of all restumping and rewiring done and some replumbing works completed also. Superbly located to offer a convenient lifestyle, that will leave you wanting nothing more. You will find yourself only moments from the Highton Village, High Street shopping precinct, Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Epworth Hospital and Deakin University, plus easy access to the Ring Road. Sure to appeal to an array of buyers, this property will impress upon inspection.

Address: 88 Golf Links Road Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
Your Dream Coastal Lifestyle Awaits
Centrally-located in the popular seaside township of Barwon Heads, this large parcel of land has been conveniently cleared and prepped ready for construction to begin. Consider building your architecturally-designed dream home with all the trimmings, or alternatively subdivide (STCA) and earn an attractive rental return. With the towns boutiques, cafes, infamous river mouth and stunning beaches all within easy walking distance, this is an opportunity not to be missed!
Positioned near the boundary of the large Village Park - with its pocket of indigenous vegetation, creative playground, walking trails and sporting facilities - the active coastal lifestyle youve dreamed about has never been easier. Kids are well-catered for with the local primary school a short bike ride down the road, kinder and daycare options right around the corner and the nearby Barwon Heads Community Garden providing learning opportunities and a meeting hub for the neighbourhood.
The location benefits from easy access to all of the regions natural assets including 13th Beach (excellent surfing), the Barwon River Estuary and the iconic Barwon Heads Bluff, and is just minutes from two world-class golf courses. The Bellarine Peninsula features a wide variety of fine dining options, wineries and attractions, with Barwon Heads being in the perfect spot from which to explore it all. Geelong can be reached in 20 minutes, and Melbournes CBD is 1.5 hours by car.
Insights: 88 Golf Links Road, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Outstanding opportunity to secure vacant land.
So youve decided to build your dream home, and you want to protect your greatest investment surrounded by homes of a similar high standard. Well this parcel of land ticks all the boxes! A rare find has just arrived on the market in the highly sought after area of Belmont. Site cut, retaining walls and fencing completed, this generous 518m2 (approx.) block is ready to go! Ideal for single level or double to take in the views. First home buyers, down sizers or the family.
Only minutes to Geelong CBD, with High street shopping precinct, Highton Village and only minutes to Barwon River with walking and cycling tracks or a stroll to Barwon Valley Fun Park. Local private and public schools (well regarded Belmont High School just around the corner), medical and sporting facilities, parklands and the ring road to Melbourne or the Surf Coast accessible within minutes, this is location and convenience at your fingertips.
Arguably the best available residential land in Belmont!
For more information, please contact Melissa Ahearn 0409183763 or Jeff Dalzotto 0411601046

Description:
Easy Living In A Grovedale Hotspot!
With the elements in place for easy living, this property is an ideal choice for first homebuyers, savvy investors, and families alike!
Set in a quiet court, this location places you within easy reach of everyday conveniences. Public transport and the Grovedale Recreation Reserve are a short walk away, while Grovedale P.S. is conveniently close by for young families. The Surf Coast Highway and Marshalltown Road shops, which include Champions IGA and ALDI, take care of all of your shopping essentials. Just jump in the car, and youll find yourself at the expansive Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre where you can shop, dine or catch the latest blockbuster. Melbourne commuters will appreciate superior access to Marshall Train Station, while the Surf Coast Highway provides easy access to the regions stunning surf beaches.
The interiors are in spotless condition throughout, granting you the option to move straight in or update with your own personal touch (STCA). Northern light sweeps through the front living room and dining room, which create ample space for everyday living. The open plan kitchen/family zone overlooks the fernery while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm electric cooktop and rangehood).
Zoned to the rear of the home for privacy, the Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite. Three additional bedrooms (two with built-in robes) share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. Two wall heaters and a ceiling fan provide comfort. Home to established trees and a large veggie garden area, the spacious backyard will impress families and green thumbs alike. A rainwater tank and garden shed put the practical elements in place, while the double carport provides off-street parking.
So what are you waiting for? Inspect without delay!
Insights: 6 Lansdowne Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Home Provides Perfect Family Lifestyle
Located just minutes away from all amenities you could ever need is this expansive home on a fantastic 531sqm approx. allotment. Boasting spacious rooms throughout with its multiple living zones, this home feels private and secure without compromising on quality and space. The kitchen truly is the centre of attention in this home as it's flooded with natural light from all angles providing a seamless connection to the outdoors.
The rear yard provides the perfect canvas to create your ideal entertainment area while giving you ideal storage for whatever your needs maybe with a sizeable lock-up shed. Whether you're looking to invest, buy your next family home or get your foot into the real estate market, the astute purchaser will instantly recognize the value this home holds and the incredible lifestyle it can provide.
- Three generously sized bedrooms, master with walk-in robe and ensuite
- Large open plan kitchen, living and dining area
- Kitchen comprises of substantial storage and stainless-steel appliances
- Neutral tones and colours throughout, near new flooring and paintwork
- Evaporative cooling and gas heating throughout
- Low maintenance gardens to front and rear yard
- Off-street car parking for up to eight vehicles
- Walking distance to Marshall train station and public transport
- Five minutes to Waurn Ponds shopping precinct and Deakin University
- Ten minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical gardens

Description:
BIENVENUE SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION!!
Here is your opportunity to secure an impressive, spacious, and very functional family home in a fantastic location. Upon hallway entry you are greeted by the sophisticated, formal dining and lounge, further down the hallway leads to the open plan family living, informal dining and sparkling modern kitchen with stone bench tops and 900mm gas cooktop, a third living / sunroom feeds from here and leads to the north faced rear yard and beautifully manicured gardens and for those who like to entertain indoors /outdoors a fully decked undercover and enclosed entertaining area is the perfect zone.
Accommodation consists of 4 bedrooms with built in robes, the master boasts a spacious en-suite with freestanding bath, stone vanity with twin basins and WIR. The remaining bedrooms are sizeable with one featuring direct access to the rear yard. Well designed, light filled family bathroom with internal separate toilet sits central to the bedrooms along with a good-sized laundry including plenty of storage.
Beautifully presented Bienvenue is a welcoming home featuring, ducted gas heating, reverse cycle heating and cooling, ceiling fans, plantation shutters, external shutters, security system, solar power (5kw system), concreted rear shed with power and running water double lock up garage with internal access, plenty of room to house a boat, caravan or trailer and double gates which open two way, all this and more on a huge 750m2 (approx.) allotment. Close to schools a short walk to Whites beach, Sands golf course and clubhouse, reserve and public transport make this spacious family home or lifestyle property the complete package. Call today for more information.

Description:
Rare Court Block in Great Location
Secure your real estate future in beautiful Torquay and build a luxury townhouse (subject to council approval) as a weekend getaway destination or something a little more permanent. Rare land offering of 375sqm (approx) in the heart of Torquay. Located within a quiet, leafy court the property boasts wide driveway access to a generous space for your dream abode. Whilst peaceful and private, the conveniences of Torquay North Shopping Centre, Torquay Central and the beautiful clear waters on Torquay's famous coastline are all nearby.
Insights: 21A Dumfries Court, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Charming Renovation Meets Family Friendly Street
For sale by Openn Negotiation (a flexible term online auction). The auction has commenced and the property can sell at any time. Contact Ricky on 0438 307 579 or William on 0488 706 144 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
Taking advantage of the low maintenance gardens and the ambience they provide is this intelligently renovated weatherboard home in one of Belmont's most desirable locations. Residing on a great 580sqm approx. allotment, the home boasts the epitome of style and efficiency throughout with its quality renovation on all places that count the most.
3D Tour is available for this listing. Private inspections are available, if you would like to inspect the property, please contact Ricky or William to arrange a time.
Stunning location within the Belmont High School Zoning
Kitchen features Blanco dishwasher, induction cooktop, ample storage
Bathroom includes oversized bath, rainfall showerhead and more
Bespoke concrete benchtop and Burmese teak in Bathroom
Central wood heater with heat transfer system to bedrooms
Ceiling fans throughout with split-system air-conditioning
Large entertainment area overlooking North-facing rear yard
Double tandem carport with access to a private and secure garden
Short walk to High Street shopping precinct, supermarkets and more
10 Minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens
Public transport at either end of the street, five minutes to Geelong Ring Road
Insights: 17 Argyle Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Family Home - Central Location
With close proximity to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and only walking distance to Heyers Rd Shops, local Medical Centre, Grovedale West Primary and Secondary College, here is a great opportunity for investors or first home buyers to get into the market with a very smart three bedroom home on a 576m2 allotment.
The rendered façade is a nice touch to the exterior while internally updates throughout make the house a "walk into no work required" affair. The master bedroom features a double vanity ensuite and walk in robe. Subway tiles compliment the kitchen area with dishwasher and wide cavity for a large refrigerator/freezer. A free standing white tub is a nice feature of the main bathroom. The living and dining areas sit adjacent with stylish "cutaways" in the original passage way wall opening up the floor plan and giving a sense of space and ease of communication with people in the kitchen. A wall unit cooler in the living room takes care of the temperature in summer months while ducted heating channels throughout.
Outside is a large deck area perfect for entertaining while the pond feature gives a tranquil touch. The rear yard further to the back would be perfect for a pet with the added safety fence. Don't miss out!
Insights: 10 Patonga Crescent, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.
